import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Dropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import SimpleBar from "simplebar-react"; import moment from "moment"; import { getMessaging, onMessage } from "firebase/messaging"; import "../../../firebase"; import { withNamespaces } from "react-i18next"; import UseNotifications from "../../../pages/Notifications/useNotifications"; const NotificationDropdown = () => { const [menu, setMenu] = useState(false); const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState(); const { adminNotificationdata } = UseNotifications(); const toggle = () => { setMenu((prevState) => !prevState); }; const messaging = getMessaging(); useEffect(() => { onMessage(messaging, (payload) => { setNotifications(payload.notification); }); }, []); return (
{"Notifications"}

{adminNotificationdata?.data.map((e) => (
{e?.redirectTo === "BOOKING" ? (
{e.actionType === "CANCELLED_BOOKING" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : e.actionType === "REVOKED_BOOKING" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : e.actionType === "SUCCESS_BOOKING" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : e.actionType === "ALERT" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : e.actionType === "INFO" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : null}
) : e?.redirectTo === "USER" ? (
{e.actionType === "CANCELLED_BOOKING" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : e.actionType === "SUCCESS_BOOKING" ? (
{e?.title}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : e.actionType === "ALERT" ? (
{e?.title}

{e?.body}

{moment .utc(e?.createdAt) .local() .startOf("seconds") .fromNow()}

) : null}
) : null}
))}
